title: Bullbear (Part 1)
body:
Bullbear (Part 1)

"Guardian my ass, that guy was definitely a thug," Evan cursed as he walked with Cedar.

"You were the one who sucked all the essence stones and even the world essence that was flowing through the walls of the mine, so as the guardian of the essence mines, it is natural that he took compensation from you," Cedar said while trying his best to control his laughter.

"That was just a low-level mine, a damn low-level mine, but he took fifty thousand high-level essence stones from me," Evan said with a twitching mouth, feeling as if he was robbed.

Cedar just shook his head hearing Evan and tried to change the subject. "So, what are you planning to do now? Do you want to use the law formation?"

Evan took some deep breaths to calm down and answered Cedar's question. "I am planning to go out of the closed world to hunt some Beginner Level Rank Two monsters."
